original_text:
Gods of Giza (Pragmatic Play)
La Pragmatic Play presenta Gods of Giza, la slot ambientata nell’Antico Egitto con sistema a cascata, Wild moltiplicatori e uno Scatter davvero speciale!
Una grafica di qualità
Di slot ambientate tra le sfingi e le piramidi se ne trova una miriade, ma poche sono coinvolgenti come Gods of Giza. D’altronde la Pragmatic Play è un mostro sacro dell’intrattenimento online, un successo decretato da milioni di giocatori del mondo.
Uno dei punti forti di Gods of Giza è senza dubbio il comparto grafico. Nel gioco base ci troviamo su una terrazza del palazzo reale, da dove si ammirano le palme e quello che sembra essere il giardino del re. Quando invece giocheremo con i Free Spins, lo sfondo di gioco sarà una stanza colma di oro e gioielli. I simboli sono molto grandi, con una definizione ottima e tonalità di colore che accentuano la tridimensionalità.
Menzione speciale per la musica che accompagna le giocate, una melodia orientaleggiante che ci immerge ancor di più con l’atmosfera della slot.
Caratteristiche della slot
Il sistema del gioco è a cascata, ciò vuol dire che dopo ogni combo pagante, i simboli vincenti vengono sostituiti da altri nuovi con cui si possono creare ulteriori serie fortunate.
La griglia ha forma quadrata, con 5 rulli e 5 righe su cui trovano casa 10 paylines fisse. Ci sono diversi livelli di scommessa, con un costo per Spin di almeno 0,20 €. Il costo massimo è invece di 100 €, la vincita più alta è di 5.000 volte la puntata.
Giri automatici, giro veloce e Turbo accelerano le giocate.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore (RTP) è del 96,01%, mentre la volatilità è alta.
Come giocare a Gods of Giza
Una particolarità di questo gioco è che i simboli base sono soltanto 6. I primi 3, quelli con valore più basso, sono rappresentati dalle pietre preziose blu, verde e rosa. Nel secondo gruppo troviamo invece l’occhio di Ra, lo sciacallo e l’aquila.
Se nella stragrande maggioranza delle slot il Wild compare in modo casuale, qui invece viene aggiunto ogni qualvolta si ottiene una combo vincente, resterà incollato durante i Respins per tre volte, poi esploderà insieme agli altri simboli. Inoltre, può comparire accompagnato da un moltiplicatore casuale compreso tra x2 e x10. Naturalmente il Wild sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter, e paga più di tutte le altre icone.
L’altro simbolo speciale è lo Scatter: quando ne atterrano 3 nello stesso Spins verso ricompensati con 10 Free Spins. Nel caso ne atterrino almeno altri 3, verranno aggiunti 5 ulteriori giri gratuiti. Durante il gioco Bonus, è garantito almeno un Wild durante ogni giro, inoltre se nel giro base scompare dopo 3 combinazioni vincenti, qui rimane per 5 Spins.

Domande Frequenti 
Come posso usufruire dei Free Spins?

Ci sono due possibilità: la prima è che sui rulli atterrino almeno 3 Scatter, la seconda è acquistare la funzione cliccando sul riquadro Buy Free Spins al costo di 100 volte la scommessa.



Posso giocare a Gods of Giza anche su Tablet?

Sì, questa slot è costruita in HTML5, quindi funziona su ogni dispositivo mobile, oltre naturalmente al pc.



Che volatilità ha Gods of Giza?

La volatilità è alta, non è semplice vincere ma potreste essere ripagati da premi di tutto rispetto!

raw_translation.response:
Gods of Giza (Pragmatic Play)
Pragmatic Play presents Gods of Giza, the slot game set in Ancient Egypt with a cascade system, Wild multipliers and a truly special Scatter!
Quality graphics
There are countless slots set among the sphinxes and pyramids, but few are as engaging as Gods of Giza. After all, Pragmatic Play is a heavyweight in the world of online gaming, a success story that has been declared by millions of players worldwide.
One of the strengths of Gods of Giza is undoubtedly the graphics. In the base game, we find ourselves on a terrace of the royal palace, from where we can admire the palm trees and what appears to be the king's garden. When we play with the Free Spins, on the other hand, the game background is a room full of gold and jewels. The symbols are very large, with excellent definition and color tones that accentuate their three-dimensionality.
Special mention goes to the music that accompanies the game, an oriental melody that immerses us even more in the atmosphere of the slot.
Slot features
The game system is a cascade, which means that after every paying combo, the winning symbols are replaced by new ones with which further lucky series can be created.
The grid is square, with 5 reels and 5 rows on which 10 fixed paylines are housed. There are different betting levels, with a Spin cost of at least €0.20. The maximum cost is €100, and the highest payout is 5,000 times the bet.
Automatic spins, fast spin, and Turbo accelerate the gameplay.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.01%, while the volatility is high.
How to play Gods of Giza
One peculiar feature of this game is that there are only 6 basic symbols. The first three, those with the lowest value, are represented by blue, green, and pink gemstones. In the second group, we find the Eye of Ra, the jackal, and the eagle.
If in the vast majority of slots the Wild appears randomly, here it is added every time a winning combo is obtained, it will remain glued during the Respins for three times, then it will explode together with the other symbols. Besides, it can appear accompanied by a random multiplier between x2 and x10. Naturally, the Wild replaces all symbols except the Scatter and pays more than all the other icons.
The other special symbol is the Scatter: when 3 land in the same Spin, you are rewarded with 10 Free Spins. In case of at least 3 more Scatter land, 5 additional free spins are added. During the Bonus game, at least one Wild is guaranteed on every spin, and if it disappears after 3 winning combinations in the base game, here it remains for 5 Spins.

FAQ
How can I use the Free Spins?
There are two ways: the first is that at least 3 Scatters land on the reels, the second is to buy the feature by clicking on the Buy Free Spins box at a cost of 100 times the bet.

Can I play Gods of Giza on a tablet?
Yes, this slot is built in HTML5, so it works on every mobile device, as well as on the computer.

What volatility does Gods of Giza have?
The volatility is high, it is not easy to win, but you could be rewarded with substantial prizes!

Review: Gods of Giza (Pragmatic Play)
Pragmatic Play presents Gods of Giza, the slot game set in Ancient Egypt with a cascade system, Wild multipliers and a truly special Scatter!
Quality graphics
There are countless slots set among the sphinxes and pyramids, but few are as engaging as Gods of Giza. After all, Pragmatic Play is a heavyweight in the world of online gaming, a success story that has been declared by millions of players worldwide.
One of the strengths of Gods of Giza is undoubtedly the graphics. In the base game, we find ourselves on a terrace of the royal palace, from where we can admire the palm trees and what appears to be the king's garden. When we play with the Free Spins, on the other hand, the game background is a room full of gold and jewels. The symbols are very large, with excellent definition and color tones that accentuate their three-dimensionality.
Special mention goes to the music that accompanies the game, an oriental melody that immerses us even more in the atmosphere of the slot.
Slot features
The game system is a cascade, which means that after every paying combo, the winning symbols are replaced by new ones with which further lucky series can be created.
The grid is square, with 5 reels and 5 rows on which 10 fixed paylines are housed. There are different betting levels, with a Spin cost of at least €0.20. The maximum cost is €100, and the highest payout is 5,000 times the bet.
Automatic spins, fast spin, and Turbo accelerate the gameplay.
The theoretical return to player (RTP) is 96.01%, while the volatility is high.
How to play Gods of Giza
One peculiar feature of this game is that there are only 6 basic symbols. The first three, those with the lowest value, are represented by blue, green, and pink gemstones. In the second group, we find the Eye of Ra, the jackal, and the eagle.
If in the vast majority of slots the Wild appears randomly, here it is added every time a winning combo is obtained, it will remain glued during the Respins for three times, then it will explode together with the other symbols. Besides, it can appear accompanied by a random multiplier between x2 and x10. Naturally, the Wild replaces all symbols except the Scatter and pays more than all the other icons.
The other special symbol is the Scatter: when 3 land in the same Spin, you are rewarded with 10 Free Spins. In case of at least 3 more Scatter land, 5 additional free spins are added. During the Bonus game, at least one Wild is guaranteed on every spin, and if it disappears after 3 winning combinations in the base game, here it remains for 5 Spins.

FAQ
How can I use the Free Spins?
There are two ways: the first is that at least 3 Scatters land on the reels, the second is to buy the feature by clicking on the Buy Free Spins box at a cost of 100 times the bet.

Can I play Gods of Giza on a tablet?
Yes, this slot is built in HTML5, so it works on every mobile device, as well as on the computer.

What volatility does Gods of Giza have?
The volatility is high, it is not easy to win, but you could be rewarded with substantial prizes!

Gods of Giza has a square grid with 5 reels and 5 rows on which 10 fixed paylines are housed.
